header.title: Fathers 65th Birthday in Valkenburg
header.intro: For Father's 65th birthday, we surprised him with a weekend getaway to Valkenburg. Little did we know that the first-ever COVID lockdown would coincide with our trip. Despite the unexpected turn of events, we embraced the opportunity to explore the town and create lasting memories together. Our time in Valkenburg became a testament to celebration and resilience in the face of challenges.

image.alt: Together with my family in Valkenburg
